0.text: Innate: Ezreal generates a stack of Rising Spell Force for each enemy hit by his abilities, lasting for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits, and stacking up to 5 times.
0.html: Innate: Ezreal generates a stack of Rising Spell Force for each enemy hit by his abilities, lasting for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits, and stacking up to 5 times.

1.text: Rising Spell Force: For each stack, Ezreal gains  10% bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 50%.
1.html: Rising Spell Force: For each stack, Ezreal gains  10% bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 50%.
markedPassages: 10% bonus attack speed

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Active: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: If Mystic Shot successfully hits an enemy, the  current cooldowns of Ezreal's abilities, including Mystic Shot's, are reduced by 1.5 seconds.
1.html: If Mystic Shot successfully hits an enemy, the  current cooldowns of Ezreal's abilities, including Mystic Shot's, are reduced by 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: current cooldowns

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an orb in the target direction that marks the first enemy  champion, epic  monster, or structure hit for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ezreal fires an orb in the target direction that marks the first enemy champion, epic monster, or structure hit for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
monster

1.text: His next basic attack or ability against the target detonates the mark to deal them bonus magic damage.
1.html: His next basic attack or ability against the target detonates the mark to deal them bonus magic damage.

2.text: If the mark was detonated with an ability, Ezreal restores  60 mana plus the mana cost of that ability.
2.html: If the mark was detonated with an ability, Ezreal restores  60 mana plus the mana cost of that ability.
markedPassages: 60 mana

0.text: Active: Ezreal  blinks from his current location to up to 475 units towards the target location, then fires a homing bolt towards the nearest enemy that deals magic damage and  reveals them for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Ezreal blinks from his current location to up to 475 units towards the target location, then fires a homing bolt towards the nearest enemy that deals magic damage and reveals them for 1 second.
markedPassages: blinks
reveals

1.text: Arcane Shift prioritizes firing at the nearest enemy marked by  Essence Flux.
1.html: Arcane Shift prioritizes firing at the nearest enemy marked by Essence Flux.
markedPassages: Essence Flux

2.text: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability. Arcane Shift will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: The target does not have to be visible to be hit by this ability. Arcane Shift will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability. Arcane Shift will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an arc of energy in the target direction that briefly grants  sight of its surroundings and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Ezreal fires an arc of energy in the target direction that briefly grants sight of its surroundings and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Minions and non-epic  monsters take 50% reduced damage.
1.html: Minions and non-epic monsters take 50% reduced damage.
markedPassages: Minions
monsters
